text: The Day We Had Hitler Home is a 2000 novel by the Australian author Rodney Hall. ==Awards and nominations== *Miles Franklin Literary Award, 2001: shortlisted ==External links== ===Reviews=== *"The Australian Public Intellectual Network" *"The London Review of Books" *"The Observer" *"Words and Flavours" Category:2000 Australian novels Category:Cultural depictions of Adolf Hitler Category:ALS Gold Medal winning works
title: The Day We Had Hitler Home
